ch.phonon.temview

Class TEMEditMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.phonon.temview.TEMEditMode

  • public class TEMEditMode
extends java.lang.Object
    The TEMEditMode class is used by the TEMView to obtain updated components as e.g. the mouse pointer Cursor for a given activated TEMEditType. The class allows to switch and cycle through the modes of the TEMEditType.
    Author:
    phonon

    • Method Summary

      Methods
